column2: Do I consider myself part of the casino capitalist process by which so few have so much and so many have so little by which Wall Street's greed and recklessness wrecked this economy? No, I don't. I believe in a society where all people do well. Not just a handful of billionaires.
Remember that Carson, Bush and Rubio are VERY weak on illegal immigration. They will do NOTHING to stop it. Our country will be overrun!
We are the United States of America, and it's our job to rein in the excesses of capitalism so that it doesn't run amok and doesn't cause the kind of inequities we're seeing in our economic system.
Well, let me tell you, Donald Trump and his billionaire friends under my policies are going to pay a hell of a lot more in taxes today - taxes in the future than they're paying today.
This is just not the right time for Jeb Bush. His campaign is in total disarray, too much staff being paid way too much money = U.S. GOVT.
I would not advocate that we put a Muslim in charge of this nation. I absolutely would not agree with that.

There is no doubt that this senseless violence is breathtaking, but I never saw a body with bullet holes that was more devastating than taking the right to arm ourselves away. Serious people seek serious solutions.

You know Obamacare is really I think the worst thing that has happened in this nation since slavery. And it is in a way, it is slavery in a way, because it is making all of us subservient to the government, and it was never about health care. It was about control.
A lot of people who go into prison straight, and when they come out they're gay.
Whether you're a teacher, an executive, or a world-champion soccer player, you deserve equal pay. Red card, GOP.

I don't buy into the dystopian scenarios of self-aware robots enslaving mankind, but you don't have to be a sci-fi conspiracy theorist to acknowledge that plenty of good, well-paying jobs are being taken over by machines
column4: American Dreams: Restoring Economic Opportunity for Everyone

column2: My mother's on Medicare and Social Security. I'm against anything that's bad for my mother.
As Gov, I gave out my email address & told the people of FL to use it. Needless to say, my inbox was pretty full.
Gov't should be accessible & easy for public to interact with. New web design standards are a good step forward.
